short_summary: One Level 3 Information Technology Security Threat and Risk Assessment and Certification and Accreditation Analyst
description: The objective of this requirement is that experts in Governance provide advice, expertise and support in the continual improvement of the relatively new Governance structure. This request for proposal is for one Bilingual (1) Level 3 – Senior IT Security TRA and C&A Analyst to provide their expertise on an “As and When Required” basis, Task Authorization Contract.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Contract Name and Title**
* TBIPS - Information Technology Security TRA and C&A Analyst (English)
* Analyste de C&A et évaluation de menace et risques en sécurité des technologies de l'information (French)

**Contract Details**

* Reference Number: cb-245-97893898
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: TBIPS-22-0018
* Publication Date: 2023-10-04

**Tender and Contract Terms**

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-10-24 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-10-24
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None
* Tender Status: Expired

**Procurement Information**

* Procurement Category: SRV
* Notice Type: RFP against Supply Arrangement
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective tendering
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Trade Agreements**

* The tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
  + Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
  + Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
  + Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
  + Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
  + World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
  + Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
  + Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
  + Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Contract Requirements**

* The successful bidder will provide a Level 3 Information Technology Security TRA and C&A Analyst.
* The work involves providing advice, expertise, and support in the continual improvement of the governance structure.
* The contract duration will be one year with an option to extend for up to four additional one-year periods.

**Bidder Information**

* Invited bidders: Accenture Inc, Adirondack Information Management Inc, and 13 others.
* Requirement Details: The requirement is open only to those TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region for the following category(ies): One (1) Level 3 Information Technology Security TRA and C&A Analyst.

* Contractor Contact Information:
  + Name: Carol A. Hambleton
  + Email: [Carol.Hambleton@cfp-psc.gc.ca](mailto:Carol.Hambleton@
